channel.title: sublime on Bob 學習筆記
channel.description: Recent content in sublime on Bob 學習筆記

item.title: [Mac] 直接在command line開啟sublime
item.description: ln -sv /Applications/Sublime\ Text.app/Contents/SharedSupport/bin/subl /usr/local/bin/subl subl test.rb git clone https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin.git subl bitcoin/ Reference: https://gist.github.com/martinbuberl/5823ed247d279d1a2d06
